The Ahilik organization is an organization that fulfilled the mission of civil society organizations in the modern sense a thousand years ago.
The ahilik organization, a tradition tradition, has become an organization that strengthens the individual against the state.
It has always been important for the individual to be strong against the state. In developed democracies the state has become the servant of the individual now.
The state can be transparent, the most basic rights can be delivered to the citizen, but if the mentality does not change, the operation will be incomplete.
Change of mindset will take time. But sooner or later the change will take place.
As a government, although we have found bureaucratic oligarchy in front of many of us, we have not compromised our determination.
After that, we will continue our reforms without slowing down.
We lifted the DGMs. We put an end to the OHAL. We have reinstated the rights of those who have been taken out of citizenship.
We were in front of giving the old names to the settlements. We made it possible for the president to be elected by the people.
We provided the removal of the EMASIA protocol and the opening of the judicial proceedings against the AGE decisions.
We called the torture zero tolerance and provided it. We have realized the silent revolutions on the subject of cultural rights.
What they said to us, Turkey was divided, they made criticism that is not basis, like losing state power.
These reforms were tried to be prevented, but on the contrary to these concerns, we have strengthened Turkey with these reforms.
We have reached EU standards at the point of rights and freedoms, and we have even passed them at some points.

The results of the UAE in the World Economic Forum's competitiveness report came to reflect our ambitions to put the country on the global economic map

The report, which covers 148 countries and is issued annually by this prestigious international institution for more than 33 years, ranks the fourth country globally in terms of the effectiveness of its markets
The UAE also excelled in its overall competitiveness in countries such as France, Ireland and Australia, and foreign direct investment and technology transfer ranked second globally
The UAE also ranked first in the world in road quality and the first in the absence of organized crime and fifth in the global infrastructure in general
The UAE government seeks only one goal - the happiness of its citizens - and perhaps this is why the third country in the world comes in the confidence of citizens in their leadership

The great trust between the people and their leadership is one of the most important secrets of the success of the UAE and the continuity of its annual progress since its inception in all development indicators

The UAE performance reflected by the WEF competitiveness report speaks of our aspirations for the UAE on the global economic map
This highly respected report has been issuing since 1979 and includes 148 countries .. the UAE came 4th in terms of markets effectiveness
The UAE's overall competitiveness surpassed that of important players like France, Ireland and Australia ...
the UAE also came second globally according to the foreign investment and technology transfer index
The UAE also came first in roads quality and absence of organized crime. It also came in the fifth place for infrastructure in general
Our only objective is to make our people happy ... Maybe that's why we came 3rd for citizens's trust in their leadership
The UAE has always continued to advance on all development indexes greatly due to the trust between the citizens and their leadership

There is a very purposeful and purposeful youth policy in Azerbaijan.
As a result of the work done today, Azerbaijani youth are signing huge jobs and playing a very important role in the society.
Azerbaijan's youth activism, their knowledge, strengthens our country today.
Youth policy is successfully implemented in Azerbaijan today. Various projects and programs are being implemented.
I would especially like to note the State Program of Azerbaijan Youth.
During the adoption of this program, broad discussions were held in the society, especially among young people.
Many of the proposals put forward by the youth have been included in this program.
Taking into account the proposal of the youth, the Youth Foundation of Azerbaijan was established by my order.
The main funds of the Fund are provided from the Reserve Fund of the President. This is a manifestation of the attitude towards youth policy.
The Youth Foundation has been successfully operating and various projects are being implemented.
The problems of youth are solved. More attention should be paid to these things in the future.
I know that issues that concern young people are a matter of housing. Mortgage lending is no longer used in Azerbaijan.
The Ministry of Youth and Sports is preparing proposals that we can cover the youth with a mortgage bill.
Today, Azerbaijani youth are active members of the society and play a very positive role in society.
People with high knowledge in Azerbaijan can find a good place for themselves.
We, the leaders of Azerbaijan today, think that no external influence can make us turn our way.
Today, there is already an idea in the society that people with great knowledge can create good living conditions for themselves.
Because Azerbaijan is independent today. The Azerbaijani people are free today. Our destiny is in our hands, and this is a historical chance.
Azerbaijan has never been so free, independent and powerful. This is a great value and a great wealth. We protect it.
You also have to keep it in the future, so that never again Azerbaijan will be exposed to any external influences.
We should try to make sure that our young people are prepared and professional. We must apply all the innovations in the world in Azerbaijan.
